<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Famous Scientists</title>
  
  <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0-alpha3/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
  <style>
    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    }
    .hero-section {
      background: url('https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?science') no-repeat center center/cover;
      height: 50vh;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      color: white;
      text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    }
    .card img {
      height: 200px;
      object-fit: cover;
    }
    .modal-body img {
      max-width: 100%;
      height: auto;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  
  <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-dark bg-dark">
    <div class="container-fluid">
      <a class="navbar-brand" href="#">Famous Scientists</a>
      <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
        <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
      </button>
      <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
        <ul class="navbar-nav ms-auto">
          <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link active" href="#">Home</a></li>
          <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#scientists">Scientists</a></li>
          <li class="nav-item"><a class="nav-link" href="#contact">Contact</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </nav>

  
  <div class="hero-section text-center">
    <h1>Explore the Minds that Changed the World</h1>
  </div>

  
  <div class="container my-5" id="scientists">
    <div class="row text-center">
      <h2>Famous Scientists</h2>
      <p>Click on a scientist to learn more about their contributions.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="row g-4">
      
      <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="card h-100">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," class="card-img-top" alt="Albert Einstein">
          <div class="card-body">
            <h5 class="card-title">Albert Einstein</h5>
            <p class="card-text">Developed the theory of relativity and reshaped physics forever.</p>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#einsteinModal">View Details</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      
      <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="card h-100">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," class="card-img-top" alt="Marie Curie">
          <div class="card-body">
            <h5 class="card-title">Marie Curie</h5>
            <p class="card-text">Pioneered research on radioactivity and won two Nobel Prizes.</p>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#curieModal">View Details</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      
      <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="card h-100">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," class="card-img-top" alt="Isaac Newton">
          <div class="card-body">
            <h5 class="card-title">Isaac Newton</h5>
            <p class="card-text">Formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation.</p>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#newtonModal">View Details</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      
      <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="card h-100">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," class="card-img-top" alt="Galileo Galilei">
          <div class="card-body">
            <h5 class="card-title">Galileo Galilei</h5>
            <p class="card-text">Father of modern science and key figure in astronomy.</p>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#galileoModal">View Details</button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  <div class="modal fade" id="einsteinModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="einsteinModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
      <div class="modal-content">
        <div class="modal-header">
          <h5 class="modal-title" id="einsteinModalLabel">Albert Einstein</h5>
          <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal"></button>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Albert Einstein">
          <p>Albert Einstein revolutionized physics with his theory of relativity. His equation, E=mc², is one of the most famous equations in history.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  <div class="modal fade" id="curieModal" tabindex="-1" aria-labelledby="curieModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
      <div class="modal-content">
        <div class="modal-header">
          <h5 class="modal-title" id="curieModalLabel">Marie Curie</h5>
          <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal"></button>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
          <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Marie Curie">
          <p>Marie Curie discovered radium and polonium, and her groundbreaking work led to advancements in cancer treatment.</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  
  

  
  <footer class="bg-dark text-white text-center py-3 mt-5" id="contact">
    <p>&copy; 2025 Famous Scientists | Designed with Bootstrap</p>
  </footer>

  
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0-alpha3/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
